snippet: Pope Benedict XVI acknowledged Thursday “with great shame” that Christianity had used force in its history, as he joined religious leaders from around the world in condemning violence in God’s name.
lead_paragraph: Pope Benedict XVI acknowledged Thursday “with great shame” that Christianity had used force in its history, as he joined religious leaders from around the world in condemning violence in God’s name.

headline.main: Italy: Pope Admits With ‘Shame’ to Use of Force by Christians
headline.print_headline: Italy: Pope Admits With ‘Shame’ To Use of Force by Christians
